message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60%, you get 40%.  A reasonable starting point, don't you think?

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can find a better solution. I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I'm also looking out for my own interests.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor. I believe this is a reasonable compromise.
Bob, time is literally money for both of us, and it's disappearing faster for me.  I'm offering you 450,000 - take it before it shrinks further!
